/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the cityscape. The street, lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, stretches out ahead, disappearing into the distance. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
